price: Kuma ga kõwanne,* akwai darajõji daga abin da suka aikata. Kuma Ubangijinka bai zama mai shagala ba daga abin da suke aikatãwa.
arabic: وَلِكُلّٖ دَرَجَٰتٞ مِّمَّا عَمِلُواْۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَٰفِلٍ عَمَّا يَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: * Kõwace jama'a, ta mãsu ɗã'a da ta mãsu sabõ, sunã da sakamakõ gwargwadon matsayin kõwanne, ga ĩmãninsa da aikinsa kõ kuwa kãfircin sãɓonsa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walikullin darajātun mimmā ʿamilū wamā rabbuka bighāfilin ʿammā yaʿmalūna
